com.mr_apps.androidbase.share

Class Sharing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mr_apps.androidbase.share.Sharing

  • public class Sharing
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains static methods that manages all the possibile sharing of content

      • isPackageExisted

        public static boolean isPackageExisted(android.content.Context context,
                       java.lang.String targetPackage)
        Verifies if the given application is installed in the device
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        targetPackage - the package name of the app to check
        Returns:
        true if the given app is installed in the device, false otherwise
